name: Visual Studio Code
description: One of the best text editor that is specialized for writing software.

name: Responsinator
description: Free tool use to check the responsiveness of your website. It will show you how your site will look in different Apple devices and Android phone of various sizes.

name: Emmet Cheat Sheet
description: Emmet is a web-developer’s toolkit that can greatly improve your HTML & CSS workflow.

name: Codepen
description: CodePen is an online code editor for testing out bugs, collaborating, and finding new inspiration.

name: Responsively
description: Free tool use to check the responsiveness of your website.

name: GitHub
description: GitHub is used for version control. It is helpful when more than just one person is working on a project.

name: HTML Reference
description: MDN HTML Reference describes details about every element and attribute in HTML.

name: HTML entities & special character
description: Useful reference enable you to use the characters that cannot be expressed in the document's character encoding.

name: CSS Reference
description: MDN CSS Reference describes every property and concept of CSS.

name: caniuse
description: 'Can I use' provides up-to-date browser support tables for front-end technologies on desktop and mobile web browsers.

name: Complete Guide to Flexbox
description: Useful flexbox reference, focusing on all the different possible properties for the parent element and the child elements.

name: CSS Reference
description: Useful CSS reference with all the important properties and info to learn CSS from the basics

name: 30 Selectors Must Know
description: List of 30 most important CSS selectors every front-end developers should know by Jeffrey Way.

name: JavaScript Reference
description: MDN JavaScript Reference help understanding some of its capabilities or features.

name: JS Operator precedence table
description: Understand the Operator order from highest precedence to lowest precedence is necessary to evaluate

name: Google Fonts
description: Most popular free and easy to use webfont library.

name: Material Palette
description: Material Design palette generated and downloadable color palette.

name: Open color
description: Open color is an open-source color scheme. Optimized for UI like font, background, border, etc.

name: Unsplash
description: Over 2 million free high-resolution images brought to you by the world’s most generous community of photographers.

name: Pexels
description: Free stock photos, royalty free images & videos shared by creators.

name: Pixabay
description: Over 2.6 million+ high quality stock images, videos and music shared by our talented community

name: Iconify
description: Iconify is the most versatile icon framework.

name: Boxicons
description: Open Source icons carefully crafted for designers & developers.

name: SiteInspire
description: Siteinspire is a showcase of the finest web and interactive design.

name: Awwwards
description: Awwwards is pretty much the gold standard when it comes to acknowledging the highest-quality web design produced today.

name: Behance
description: Easy to find massive amounts of web design inspiration from their huge, diverse creative community.

name: FreeCodeCamp
description: Great learning web platform to help people learn to code for free.

name: Stack Overflow
description: Biggest programmer community. Ask questions and find best answer to your technical question. Also help others answer theirs.

name: CSS Tricks
description: Keeping yourself up-to-date is paramount. Css Tricks provide daily articles, guides, and even an almanac. mainly focus on front-end development.

name: The Coding Train
description: The Coding Train is on its way with creative coding video tutorials on subjects ranging from the basics of programming languages like JavaScript to algorithmic art, machine learning, simulation, generative poetry, and more.
